Articles.Content: When renaming vehicles from the tracking station it does not seem to save the changed name; when you re-enter the tracking station after leaving the name reverts to what it was before.
I couldn't even find a rename option. Where is it?

13 minutes ago, WingC3 said:


I couldn't even find a rename option. Where is it?

With the craft selected in the tracking station look for the pencil icon to the right of the name in the upper right of the screen. If you click the pencil that will put you in an edit mode to change the name of the craft.

Interestingly, if you want to rename more than one craft you're also in trouble. You can rename one, but when you go to rename the next you end up re-renaming the first. So, not only does it not persist when you leave the tracking station, it's borked right there in the tracking station.
And sounds like it's not saving those changes anyway.  Plus, you can't change the  vehicle type like you could in KSP 1  either.   Looks like I'll be editing JSON a lot until that gets fixed.
